meanings.sent1: Don't be a bobo and forget your lunch at home.
meanings.sent2: The teacher scolded the bobo for not doing their homework.
meanings.sent3: The bobo thought the moon was made of cheese.
meanings.sent4: His actions made him look like a bobo in front of everyone.
meanings.sent5: Being a bobo can sometimes lead to funny situations.

meanings.sent1: She made a bobo by adding salt instead of sugar to the cake.
meanings.sent2: The bobo in the report caused confusion among the team.
meanings.sent3: It was a bobo to wear slippers to a formal event.
meanings.sent4: The bobo in his calculations led to a wrong answer.
meanings.sent5: Making a bobo in the recipe can ruin the dish.

meanings.definition: To make a mistake or error.
meanings.sent1: Try not to bobo when following the instructions.
meanings.sent2: He tends to bobo when under pressure.
meanings.sent3: She boboed by sending the email to the wrong person.
meanings.sent4: If you bobo the code, the program won't work.
meanings.sent5: It's easy to bobo when you rush through things.
